title: Harbor Configuration
description: Configuration schema for Harbor CLI - a tool for running multiple development services

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for IDE IntelliSense

services.description: List of development services to run

name.description: Display name for the service (shown in the terminal UI)

path.description: Relative path to the service directory from the project root

command.description: Command to start the service (e.g., 'bun run dev', 'go run .')

log.description: Whether to log output to a file in .harbor/logs/

maxLogLines.description: Maximum number of lines to keep in the log file

canAccess.description: Names of other services this pane can send commands to via hail/survey/parley

sessionName.description: Custom name for the tmux session (default: local-dev-test)

before.description: Scripts to run before starting services

path.description: Relative path to run the command from

after.description: Scripts to run after all services stop

path.description: Relative path to run the command from
